meanings.definition: A tropical fruit with a sweet, juicy flesh and a large seed inside.
meanings.sent1: I love eating a ripe mango on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store sells fresh mangoes in the produce section.
meanings.sent3: The mango rolled off the table and made a juicy mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and refreshing as a ripe mango.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant orange color of the mango made it look like a tropical sunset.

meanings.definition: A tree that produces the mango fruit.
meanings.sent1: The mango tree in our backyard provides us with delicious fruits every year.
meanings.sent2: Farmers take good care of mango trees to ensure a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent3: The mango tree waved its branches in the wind as if greeting passersby.
meanings.sent4: The mango tree stood tall and proud, bearing the weight of its ripe fruits.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the mango tree blossoms filled the air with a sweet aroma.
